name: @webreflection/custom-elements
description: All inclusive customElements polyfill for every browser

scripts.build: node bundle/build.js && npm run rollup && npm run copy && npm run move && npm run patch && npm run pony && npm run modules && npm run delete && npm run min && npm run size
scripts.copy: echo '/*! (c) Andrea Giammarchi @webreflection ISC */' > index.js && cat tmp.js >> index.js
scripts.modules: mv pony.js esm/index.js && ascjs --no-default esm cjs
scripts.move: echo '/*! (c) Andrea Giammarchi @webreflection ISC */' > pony.js && cat bundle/pony.js >> pony.js
scripts.delete: rm bundle/index.js && rm bundle/pony.js && rm tmp.js
scripts.rollup: rollup --config rollup/babel.config.js && rollup --config rollup/es.config.js && rollup --config rollup/test.config.js
scripts.size: cat min.js | gzip | wc -c && cat es.js | gzip | wc -c

author: Andrea Giammarchi
